articles.description: This photo was taken of the fireball that exploded over Utah in 2009. On Friday, March 11th, a similar asteroid exploded over the Arctic Ocean.
articles.content:
Estimated reading time: 4-5 minutes
SALT LAKE CITY – An asteroid smaller than a GPS satellite but traveling at twice the speed impacted Earth’s atmosphere over the Arctic Ocean on Friday after it wa… [+5354 chars]
